name: PororoTV
description: * Congratulation! Pororo TV OPEN! *  Only on Pororo TV,  You can watch full episodes of Pororo the Little Penguin, Tayo the Little Bus, Chiro for free. Pororo TV gives a break time like a ray of sunshine to parents and magical experiences to children.  * Features * Enjoy unlimited instant streaming of animation for free Download is available. You dont need to worry about data cost on your mobile phone. Having some Wi Fi troubles? Dont worry. You can download animation and watch it anytime you want. Personalized services like magic will be offered to your child soon. 500 episodes children love are on Pororo TV. Pororo the Little Penguin Season #1~4 Sing along with Pororo Eddy the Clever Fox Season #1~2 Loopy, the Cooking Princess  Tayo the Little Bus Season #1~2 Sing along with Tayo Chiro, Chiro Classic Songs. Art Odyssey Z-ranger Special contents & personalized contents English Dubbed Episodes  More Pororo TV only contents will be updated.  Please look forward to it. If you want all these experiences, download Pororo TV App!  * Caution: Please note that a child may be addicted to Pororo. Especially, parents who have a 2~4 year old child should pay attention to the fact. * Compatibility: requires Samsung Galaxy S2 or later. Otherwise, Pororo TV app may not work well. This app is optimized for a mobile phone.  * Inquiry: Setting > Support > 1:1  ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Contact: ICONIX 64, Pangyo-ro, 255beon-gil, bundang-gu Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do 463-400, Korea system, PororoTV leads the users to experience a very special joy and value.
